comments.content:
Change abandoned by John Garbutt (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/292800
Reason: I don't have the bandwidth to chase this down the more complicated fix.

Since we don't seem happy with the quick fix, abandoning this so someone else which more knowledge and time can take a closer look into the problem here.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/292800
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=df15e467b61fee781e78b07bf910d6b411bafd44
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit df15e467b61fee781e78b07bf910d6b411bafd44
Author: John Garbutt <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Mar 15 10:21:47 2016 +0000

    db: retry on deadlocks while adding an instance
    
    We are hitting deadlocks in the gate when we are inserting the new
    instance_extra row into the DB.
    
    We should follow up this fix and look at way to avoid the deadlock
    happening rather than retrying it. It currently doesn't happen too
    often, so this should be enough to stop the problem while we work on a
    better fix.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1480305
    
    Change-Id: Iba218bf28c7d1e6040c551fe836d6fa5e5e45f4d
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/367508
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=fdfab99ba8e66ac15c25fcf5f2b3503aeab73742
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    stable/mitaka

commit fdfab99ba8e66ac15c25fcf5f2b3503aeab73742
Author: John Garbutt <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Mar 15 10:21:47 2016 +0000

    db: retry on deadlocks while adding an instance
    
    We are hitting deadlocks in the gate when we are inserting the new
    instance_extra row into the DB.
    
    We should follow up this fix and look at way to avoid the deadlock
    happening rather than retrying it. It currently doesn't happen too
    often, so this should be enough to stop the problem while we work on a
    better fix.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1480305
    
    Change-Id: Iba218bf28c7d1e6040c551fe836d6fa5e5e45f4d
    (cherry picked from commit df15e467b61fee781e78b07bf910d6b411bafd44)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.1.2 release.
